topic.title: WHO research team joining the COVID cover up train
topic.body: As you heard the WHO team who went to china to investigate the virus have obviously been hushed up by the chinese gov by making a public statement that they did not find any evidence of the virus in the lab and that the disease came from an animal. however if that was the case why did china start silencing their doctors and scientests on the matter ?

topic.title: is the creator of Timekoin also Satoshi Nakamoto ?
topic.body: there is a guy who created Timekoin by the name of knightmb he was around in the early days of bitcoin and i believe was one of the core devs of bitcoin as well. In fact i think he is Nakamoto
